link.script: /* CSS Browser Selector v0.4.0 (Nov 02, 2010) Can apply styles to specific browsers, this js adds a class to body tag based on browser Rafael Lima (http://rafael.adm.br) http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/ Contributors: http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector#contributors */ function css_browser_selector(u) { var ua = u.toLowerCase(), is = function (t) { return ua.indexOf(t) > -1 }, g = 'gecko', w = 'webkit', s = 'safari', o = 'opera', m = 'mobile', h = document.documentElement, b = [(!(/opera|webtv/i.test(ua)) && /msie\s(\d)/.test(ua)) ? ('ie ie' + RegExp.$1) : is('firefox/2') ? g + ' ff2' : is('firefox/3.5') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_5' : is('firefox/3.6') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_6' : is('firefox/3') ? g + ' ff3' : is('gecko/') ? g : is('opera') ? o + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$1 : (/opera(\s|\/)(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$2 : '')) : is('konqueror') ? 'konqueror' : is('blackberry') ? m + ' blackberry' : is('android') ? m + ' android' : is('chrome') ? w + ' chrome' : is('iron') ? w + ' iron' : is('applewebkit/') ? w + ' ' + s + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + s + RegExp.$1 : '') : is('mozilla/') ? g : '', is('j2me') ? m + ' j2me' : is('iphone') ? m + ' iphone' : is('ipod') ? m + ' ipod' : is('ipad') ? m + ' ipad' : is('mac') ? 'mac' : is('darwin') ? 'mac' : is('webtv') ? 'webtv' : is('win') ? 'win' + (is('windows nt 6.0') ? ' vista' : '') : is('freebsd') ? 'freebsd' : (is('x11') || is('linux')) ? 'linux' : '', 'js']; c = b.join(' '); h.className += ' ' + c; return c; }; css_browser_selector(navigator.userAgent);

input.name: __VIEWSTATE
__EVENTVALIDATION

strong.span: All schools are closed until May 15th as directed by NYS Governor Andrew Cuomo, in response to the state's COVID-19 response.
All school facilities, playing fields, the track, and courts are closed to the public until further notice.

div.span: Maine-Endwell Schools are closed until May 15 as directed by NYS Governor Andrew Cuomo in response to the impact of COVID-19. Visit our COVID-19 web page for more information.

div.h2: Delivering a premier education to each student

span.span: Please note that schools and facilities are closed until May 15. Check this page for information about Coronavirus, COVID-19. We will provide statements from the district, as well as links to valuable information, as they become available.

span.strong: The latest message from Superintendent Jason Van Fossen are at this link.

div.h2: Apply for Free and Reduced Meals

span.span: Are you experiencing a financial impact because of the COVID-19 crisis? We encourage you to apply for free and reduced meals. You can apply online at this link:

br.span: If you need additional assistance, we encourage you to apply for SNAP.

div.span: The latest information from the BC Health Department about the virus.

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'URL', 'Link', 'New York State Department of Health Website');

div.a: New York State Department of Health Website

div.span: The most up-to-date information from the NYS Health Dept. about the virus.
General information about the virus from the CDC.

As we work through these challenging times together, NY State of Health is committed to ensuring access to affordable, quality health insurance for all New Yorkers so they can get the care they need during this state of emergency.

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'URL', 'Link', 'How to talk to your kids about the coronavirus (to reduce stress)');

div.a: How to talk to your kids about the coronavirus (to reduce stress)

div.a: How to talk to your kids about the coronavirus (and ease their fears)

div.a: What to do if you are sick

div.span: When and how to properly wash hands. Hand washing saves lives!
Good hygiene tips for germ prevention.
